editPhone.title: Change Phone Number
editPhone.label: Enter your new phone number
editPhone.description: We'll send an OTP to your new phone number for verification.

editEmail.title: Change Email
editEmail.label: Enter your new email address
editEmail.description: We'll send an OTP to your new email for verification.

otp.title: Enter OTP
otp.enter: Enter the 6-digit OTP sent to your contact
otp.phoneDescription: An OTP has been sent to your phone: {{value}}
otp.emailDescription: An OTP has been sent to your email: {{value}}

success.title: Success
success.phone: Your phone number has been updated successfully!
success.email: Your email has been updated successfully!

error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

rateUs.title: Rate us
rateUs.subtitle: How did you like using the app

profileDetail.title: Profile Details
profileDetail.subtitle: Here you can view and edit your details.
profileDetail.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

autoPayment.title: Auto Payment Settings
autoPayment.subtitle: Set up automatic payments and services

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Password and authentication settings
security.enableBiometricDesc: Use fingerprint or face recognition to unlock the app
security.disableBiometricDesc: Remove biometric authentication from your account
security.enterPasswordToEnable: Enter your password to enable biometric authentication
security.enterPasswordToDisable: Enter your password to disable biometric authentication

supportCenter.title: Support Center
supportCenter.subtitle: Get help and contact customer support

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.subtitle: Detailed information about the company and support contact

actions.logoutDescription: Are you sure you want to logout?

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.profileInstruction: We will send an OTP to your registered phone number to reset your password.
resetPassword.phoneNote: This phone number cannot be changed during password reset

otp.subtitle: Enter the verification code sent to {{phone}}

loading.title: Verifying OTP
loading.subtitle: Please wait while we verify your code

newPassword.title: Set New Password
newPassword.instruction: Enter your new password. Make sure it's at least 8 characters long.
newPassword.label: New Password

validation.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

success.title: Password Reset Successful
success.profileMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. The new password is now active for your account.

error.title: Reset Failed
error.message: Failed to reset password. Please try again.

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.instruction: Enter your current password and choose a new password. Your new password must be at least 8 characters long.

validation.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.mustBeDifferent: New password must be different from current password

success.title: Password Changed Successfully
success.message: Your password has been successfully changed. Please use your new password for future logins.

error.title: Change Password Failed
error.message: Failed to change password. Please check your current password and try again.

storeDetail.title: Store Details
storeDetail.description: Detailed information about the store and owner

avatar.useCamera: Use camera to take a new photo
avatar.previewDescription: This is how your avatar will look
avatar.uploadingDescription: Please wait while we upload your avatar...
avatar.successDescription: Your avatar has been updated successfully.
